channel.title: NPC Help!
channel.description: Green drags spawn in wild, people get themselves killed by drag for pk points, using hybridpvp v3 source on this, removed from autospawn file, they still spawn, and respawn. if you know how to remove please post it, thanks.

item.title: NPC Help!

item.description:

if(c.inWild()){
o.pkPoints += 5;
o.sendMessage(“You have received 5 Pk Points”);
}

item.title: NPC Help!
item.dc:creator: @Venge_Drop Venge Drop
item.description:
@Venge_Drop wrote:

public void applyDead() {
c.respawnTimer = 10;
c.isDead = false;
if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
//c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
c.killerId = findKiller();
Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
if(o != null) {
if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){
}
if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
o.sendMessage(“You have defeated “+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+”!”);
if(c.inWild()){
c.pkPoints += 5;
o.sendMessage(“You have received 5 Pk Points”);
}
c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
if(o.duelStatus == 0) {
o.duelStatus++;
hmmm… could point out what exactly to edit, i notice at the top it states “applydead” should be apply… what?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help!
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

[quote=".cLass, post:7, topic:409874"][quote author=Kalvin link=topic=511147.msg3709283#msg3709283 date=1313249974]
I highly doubt it’s to do with npcs, maybe you coded your pk point system incorrectly - by this I mean maybe when a person dies, only the person who dies recieves the pk points.
[/quote]
Please read the thread, he want to remove the dragons.[/quote]

I’ve read the thread, like I said green dragons are probably not the problem - it’s the pk point system. He wants to remove them because he thinks they’re “Glitched”. I’m pretty sure, when he removes them his players will just get “Other monsters” to kill them for pk points. So, my question to you is, why remove like 0.01% of the problem and not all of it?

Read full topic
